en.title: Most Popular Cat Breeds in Japan 2025: Where Does the Siberian Rank?
en.content:
The most popular cat breeds in Japan shift from year to year. In this article, we explore the trends in popular cat breeds for 2025 and take a closer look at the rising Siberian.

Top 10 Cat Breeds in Japan

The breeds that have remained consistently popular in Japan include the Scottish Fold, Munchkin, American Shorthair, British Shorthair, Ragdoll, Norwegian Forest Cat, Bengal, Maine Coon, Russian Blue, and the Siberian.

Why Siberians Are Growing in Popularity

Attention to Their Hypoallergenic Qualities

As more people who suffer from cat allergies still want to own cats, awareness of the Siberian as a low-allergen breed has been increasing.

The Natural Breed Trend

Growing concern about health problems associated with artificial selective breeding has led people to value the robustness of natural breeds.

Increased Social Media Exposure

With more Siberian videos appearing on Instagram and TikTok, their fluffy appearance and gentle temperament have become widely recognized.

Tips for Choosing a Cat Breed

Rather than relying solely on popularity rankings, it's important to choose a breed that suits your lifestyle, family situation, and living environment. If a breed catches your eye, we recommend visiting a trusted breeder to meet the cats in person.

zh.title: 2025年日本最受欢迎猫种排名：西伯利亚猫排第几？
zh.content:
日本最受欢迎的猫种每年都在变化。本文将介绍2025年热门猫种的趋势，以及备受瞩目的西伯利亚猫。

日本人气猫种Top 10

在日本长期保持高人气的猫种包括：苏格兰折耳猫、曼基康猫、美国短毛猫、英国短毛猫、布偶猫、挪威森林猫、孟加拉猫、缅因猫、俄罗斯蓝猫，以及西伯利亚猫。

西伯利亚猫人气上升的原因

低致敏特性受到关注

随着越来越多对猫过敏但又想养猫的人增加，西伯利亚猫作为低致敏猫种的知名度也在不断提高。

天然猫种的潮流

人们对人工品种改良带来的健康问题日益关注，天然猫种的强健体质因此更受青睐。

社交媒体曝光增加

随着Instagram和TikTok上西伯利亚猫的视频增多，它们毛茸茸的外表和温和的性格被越来越多的人所了解。

选择猫种的要点

不要仅凭人气排名来选择，重要的是选择适合自己生活方式、家庭构成和居住环境的猫种。如果有心仪的猫种，建议去信赖的猫舍实际见面了解。
